### 1.1 Computing with Language:Texts and Words

Python interpreter -> with IDLE

>>> import nltk
>>> nltk.download()

>>> from nltk.book import *
>>> text1
<Text: Moby Dick by Herman Melville 1851>
>>> text2
<Text: Sense and Sensibility by Jane Austen 1811>

#### concordance
>>> text1.concordance("monstrous") Building index...
Displaying 11 of 11 matches:
monstrous size . ... This came towards us , 
monstrous bulk of the whale or ork we have r 
monstrous clubs and spears . Some were thick

#### similar
print(text1.similar("monstrous"))
sometimes functions as an intensifier like the word very.


#### common_contexts
>>> text2.common_contexts(["monstrous", "very"]) 
be_glad am_glad a_pretty is_pretty a_lucky
